temples.name: santo-domingo-dominican-republic-temple
temples.history: The Santo Domingo Dominican Republic Temple was the first temple built in the Caribbean and in the Dominican Republic. The temple was announced on November 16, 1993, the groundbreaking and site dedication was on August 18, 1996, by Richard G. Scott, the public open house was from August 26 to September 9, 2000, and the dedication was on September 17, 2000, by Gordon B. Hinckley.
session-schedule: Tuesday to Friday: 9:00 am, 10:00 am, 5:00 pm, 6:00 pm, and 7:00 pm, Walk-ins and Appointments.
Saturdays: 6:15 am, and Every hour from 7:00 am to 4:00 pm, Walk-ins and Appointments.

temples.name: port-au-prince-haiti-temple
temples.history: The Port-au-Prince Haiti Temple is the first temple built in Haiti and the second built in the Caribbean, following the Santo Domingo Dominican Republic Temple (2000). The temple was announced on April 5, 2015, the groundbreaking and site dedication was on October 28, 2017, by Walter F. Gonz√°lez, the public open house was from August 8 to August 17, 2019, and the dedication was on September 1, 2019, by David A. Bednar.
session-schedule: Tuesday to Friday: 10:00 am, and 2:00 pm, Appointments Only.
Saturdays: 9:30 am, and 1:30 pm, Appointments Only.
